testimonials.name: Alex M.
testimonials.text: Greg helped me finally understand hypothesis testing and confidence intervals. His explanations are clear and he's incredibly patient. I went from a C to an A- in my stats course.

testimonials.name: Sarah L.
testimonials.text: Best tutor I've ever had. Greg doesn't just help with homework -- he teaches you to think like a researcher. His background in meta-analysis gives him unique insights into study design.

testimonials.name: Jordan K.
testimonials.text: Greg helped me design and analyze my senior thesis project. His guidance on power analysis and effect sizes was invaluable. I got my thesis published partly thanks to his methodological insights.
